keyword: how many calories in a pupusa
title: How Many Calories in a Pupusa?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a pupusa, including macros like protein, carbs, fat, plus variations and nutrition facts for this Salvadoran staple.
h1: How Many Calories in a Pupusa?
assumptions: Standard cheese and bean pupusa (revuelta style), about 100 g, made with corn masa, no added oil or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by filling (e.g., pork, cheese, veggies), size, recipe, and cooking method. Check labels or recipes when available.

quick_answer.text: One typical pupusa has about 250 kcal, with 10 g protein and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a pupusa with cheese?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for a standard cheese and bean pupusa.

faqs.q: What are the macros in one pupusa?
faqs.a: Roughly 30 g carbs, 10 g protein, 10 g fat, and 3 g fiber.
Yes, around 500 mg per pupusa due to masa and fillings.

faqs.q: How does pork change pupusa calories?
faqs.a: Adds about 100 kcal, making it 350 kcal total.
Traditional ones have ~30 g carbs from corn masa; veggie versions slightly lower.
